name: Space Junkies (itch) (Andrey Viktorov)
description:
Ludum Dare 47 game page

You could have left this doomed planet, but you ran out of fuel to do so. Collect the garbage and find enough fuel to escape. You are not the only one who's trying to fly away, so beware others just like you, STUCK IN THE LOOP.

Controls

PanelsCommon ActionsDefault ModeCombat Mode`H` - Help`F` - start refinery `E` - grab nearby junk `LMB` - fire `1` - Cargo `R` - reload`Mouse` - aim `2` - Refinery`C` - toggle default / combat mode`3` - Combat`RMB` or `MMB` - camera look`4` - Engine
